sentence.text: Objective: To study the effect and mechanism of S1PR2 inhibition on epithelial ovarian cancer SKOV3 cell proliferation in vitro and in vivo.
Twenty-eight days after nude mice intraperitoneal injection with JTE-013 or PBS, the mice were sacrificed and the number and the weight of visible tumors were calculated.
The tumor number and weight in the JTE-013 group were significantly less than those in the control group (all PAAAA0.01) .
Conclusions: The growth of ovarian cancer cells could be decreased by S1PR2 inhibition in vitro and in vivo.
